test_cases.title: Successful User Registration
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register with valid name, email, and password.
test_steps: Enter valid name, email, and strong password
test_cases.expected_results: User receives confirmation email and is redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Registration with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when an invalid email format is entered.
test_steps: Enter valid name, invalid email (e.g., 'user@com'), and strong password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid email format.

test_cases.title: Registration with Weak Password
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when a weak password is entered.
test_steps: Enter valid name, valid email, and weak password (e.g., '123')
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for weak password.

test_cases.title: Registration with Existing Email
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when using an already registered email.
test_steps: Enter valid name, already registered email, and strong password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message indicating email is already in use.

test_cases.title: Registration Boundary Test - Maximum Length Fields
test_cases.description: Verify registration works with maximum allowed length for name, email, and password.
test_steps: Enter maximum allowed characters for name, email, and password
test_cases.expected_results: User receives confirmation email and is redirected to login page.

test_cases.title: Successful User Login
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in with valid credentials.
test_cases.expected_results: User is redirected to dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with Invalid Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that login fails with incorrect email or password.
test_steps: Enter valid email and incorrect password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid login.

test_cases.title: Login with 'Remember Me' Option
test_cases.description: Verify that selecting 'Remember Me' keeps the user logged in across sessions.
test_cases.expected_results: User remains logged in and can access dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login Lockout After Multiple Failed Attempts
test_cases.description: Verify that user is locked out after 5 consecutive failed login attempts.
test_steps: Enter valid email and incorrect password five times
test_cases.expected_results: User is locked out and cannot log in; system displays lockout message.

test_cases.title: Login Boundary Test - Empty Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that login fails when email and password fields are left empty.
test_steps: Leave email and password fields empty
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for required fields.

test_cases.title: Request Password Reset
test_cases.description: Verify that user can request a password reset via email.
test_cases.expected_results: System sends password reset link to registered email.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Unregistered Email
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset fails when an unregistered email is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for unregistered email.

test_cases.title: Set New Password Using Reset Link
test_cases.description: Verify that user can set a new password using the reset link.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_cases.expected_results: Password is updated and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Weak New Password
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset fails when a weak new password is entered.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for weak password.

test_cases.title: Password Reset Link Expiry
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset link expires after a set period.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for expired link.

test_cases.title: Edit Profile Information Successfully
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit name, email, and contact information.
test_steps: Edit name, email, and contact information with valid dATF
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately; confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that profile update fails when email format is invalid.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for invalid email format.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Existing Email
test_cases.description: Verify that profile update fails when changing email to one already in use.
test_steps: Edit email to an already used email
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message indicating email is already in use.

test_cases.title: Profile Update Boundary Test - Maximum Length Fields
test_cases.description: Verify profile updates with maximum allowed length for name and contact information.
test_steps: Edit name and contact information to maximum allowed length
test_cases.expected_results: Changes are saved and reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: View Dashboard Successfully
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard displays user's name, profile picture, recent activity, and account summary.
test_steps: Navigate to dashboard from main navigation
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays user's name, profile picture, recent activity, and account summary.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Recent Activity Chronological Order
test_cases.description: Verify that recent activity is listed in chronological order on dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Recent activity is listed chronologically.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Real-time Update
test_cases.description: Verify that dashboard updates in real-time when new activity occurs.
test_steps: Perform an action (e.g., add favorite item)
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard updates immediately to reflect new activity.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Access from Main Navigation
test_cases.description: Verify that user can access dashboard from main navigation.
test_steps: Locate dashboard link in main navigation
test_cases.expected_results: User is taken to dashboard page.

test_cases.title: Dashboard Boundary Test - No Recent Activity
test_cases.description: Verify dashboard displays appropriate message when there is no recent activity.
test_cases.expected_results: Dashboard displays message indicating no recent activity.

test_cases.title: Search Items with Valid Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for items using valid keywords.
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant search results are displayed within 2 seconds.

test_cases.title: Search Items with No Results
test_cases.description: Verify that system displays appropriate message when no search results are found.
test_steps: Enter uncommon keyword in search bar
test_cases.expected_results: System displays message indicating no results found.

test_cases.title: Search with Filtering and Sorting
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter and sort search results.
test_cases.expected_results: Filtered and sorted results are displayed in order of relevance.

test_cases.title: Search Responsiveness Test
test_cases.description: Verify that search results are returned within 2 seconds.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are displayed within 2 seconds.

test_cases.title: Clear Search Input
test_cases.description: Verify that user can clear search input and results.
test_cases.expected_results: Search input and results are cleared.

test_cases.title: Apply Multiple Advanced Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that user can apply multiple advanced filters simultaneously.
test_cases.expected_results: Filtered results update instantly and reflect all applied filters.

test_cases.title: Reset Advanced Filters
test_cases.description: Verify that user can reset all applied filters to default.
test_cases.expected_results: All filters are reset to default and results update accordingly.

test_cases.title: Display Number of Results per Filter
test_cases.description: Verify that system displays the number of results for each filter applied.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays correct number of results per filter.

test_cases.title: Advanced Filters Edge Case - No Results
test_cases.description: Verify that applying filters with no matching results displays appropriate message.
test_steps: Apply filters that exclude all items
test_cases.expected_results: System displays message indicating no results found.

test_cases.title: View Item Details Successfully
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view detailed information about an item.
test_cases.expected_results: Details page displays all relevant information (description, images, price, etc.).

test_cases.title: Navigate Back to Search Results from Item Details
test_cases.description: Verify that user can navigate back to search results from item details page.
test_cases.expected_results: User is returned to previous search results.

test_cases.title: Item Details Image Gallery Display
test_cases.description: Verify that images are displayed in a gallery format on item details page.
test_cases.expected_results: Images are displayed in gallery format and can be browsed.

test_cases.title: Related Items Suggestion on Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that related items are suggested on item details page.
test_cases.expected_results: Related items are displayed on details page.

test_cases.title: Item Details Edge Case - Item with No Images
test_cases.description: Verify that item details page handles items with no images gracefully.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays placeholder or message for missing images.

test_cases.title: Add Item to Favorites
test_cases.description: Verify that user can mark an item as favorite.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added to favorites list and count is updated.

test_cases.title: Remove Item from Favorites
test_cases.description: Verify that user can remove an item from favorites.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is removed from favorites and count is updated.

test_cases.title: Favorites List Accessible from Dashboard
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites list is accessible from dashboard.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list is displayed.

test_cases.title: Favorites Persistence Across Sessions
test_cases.description: Verify that favorites persist after user logs out and logs back in.
test_cases.expected_results: Favorites list contains previously added items.

test_cases.title: Favorites Edge Case - Maximum Favorites
test_cases.description: Verify system behavior when user adds maximum allowed items to favorites.
preconditions: Favorites list is near maximum capacity
test_steps: Add items to favorites until maximum limit is reached
test_cases.expected_results: System allows up to maximum limit and displays error when trying to exceed.

test_cases.title: Receive Notification for Account Activity
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives notification for account activity.
test_steps: Perform an account activity (e.g., password change)
test_cases.expected_results: Notification for account activity is displayed.

test_cases.title: Unread Notifications Highlighted
test_cases.description: Verify that unread notifications are highlighted in notifications section.
test_cases.expected_results: Unread notifications are visually highlighted.

test_cases.title: Mark Notification as Read
test_cases.description: Verify that user can mark notifications as read.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is marked as read and highlight is removed.

test_cases.title: Delete Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that user can delete notifications.
test_cases.expected_results: Notification is removed from list.

test_cases.title: Notifications Edge Case - No Notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that notifications section displays appropriate message when there are no notifications.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays message indicating no notifications.

test_cases.title: Admin View List of All Users
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view a list of all user accounts.
test_cases.expected_results: List of all users is displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Activate/Deactivate User Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can activate or deactivate user accounts.
test_cases.expected_results: User account status is updated and change is logged.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit User Details
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit user details.
test_cases.expected_results: User details are updated and change is logged.

test_cases.title: Admin Reset User Password
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can reset user password.
test_cases.expected_results: User password is reset and change is logged.

test_cases.title: Admin User Management Audit Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that all admin actions are logged for audit purposes.
test_steps: Perform any user management action (edit, activate/deactivate, reset password)
test_cases.expected_results: Audit log contains entry for performed action with timestamp and actor.

test_cases.title: Admin Add New Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can add new items to the system.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is added and changes are reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit Existing Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit existing items.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is updated and changes are reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: Admin Delete Item
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can delete items from the system.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is deleted and changes are reflected immediately.

test_cases.title: Item DATF Validation Before Saving
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates item dATF before saving.
test_steps: Enter invalid item dATF (e.g., missing required fields)
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message and item is not saved.

test_cases.title: Audit Log Records Significant Actions
test_cases.description: Verify that audit log records all significant actions including login, updates, and deletions.
test_cases.expected_results: Audit log contains entries for all significant actions with timestamp and actor.

test_cases.title: Audit Log Search by Date and User
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can search audit logs by date and user.
test_steps: Enter date range and user filter
test_cases.expected_results: Audit log displays filtered entries matching criteria.

test_cases.title: Audit Log Export to CSV
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can export audit logs to CSV format.
test_cases.expected_results: CSV file is generated and downloadable.

test_cases.title: Audit Log Unauthorized Access Protection
test_cases.description: Verify that audit logs are protected from unauthorized access.
test_steps: Attempt to access audit log section
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and unauthorized attempt is logged.

test_cases.title: Assign Role to User Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can assign roles to user accounts.
test_cases.expected_results: Role is assigned and permissions are updated immediately.

test_cases.title: Role-Based Access Enforcement
test_cases.description: Verify that system enforces permissions based on assigned role.
test_steps: Attempt to access feature restricted to assigned role
test_cases.expected_results: Access is granted or denied based on role permissions.

test_cases.title: Role Change Immediate Effect
test_cases.description: Verify that role changes take effect immediately.
test_cases.expected_results: User permissions reflect new role immediately.

test_cases.title: Unauthorized Access Attempt Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that unauthorized access attempts are logged.
test_cases.expected_results: Access is denied and attempt is logged in audit log.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Mobile Device
test_cases.description: Verify that application layout adjusts and is usable on mobile devices.
preconditions: User accesses application on mobile device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adjusts, features are accessible, and no horizontal scrolling is required.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Tablet Device
test_cases.description: Verify that application layout adjusts and is usable on tablet devices.
preconditions: User accesses application on tablet device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adjusts, features are accessible, and no horizontal scrolling is required.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Desktop Device
test_cases.description: Verify that application layout adjusts and is usable on desktop devices.
preconditions: User accesses application on desktop device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adjusts, features are accessible, and no horizontal scrolling is required.

test_cases.title: Navigation Usability on Touch Devices
test_cases.description: Verify that navigation is usable on touch devices.
preconditions: User accesses application on touch device
test_steps: Use navigation to access different sections
test_cases.expected_results: Navigation is responsive and usable via touch.

test_cases.title: Images and Text Scaling Appropriately
test_cases.description: Verify that images and text scale appropriately on different device sizes.
preconditions: User accesses application on various devices
test_steps: Open application on mobile, tablet, and desktop
test_cases.expected_results: Images and text scale appropriately on all devices.

test_cases.title: Access Help Section from Main Navigation
test_cases.description: Verify that help section is accessible from main navigation.
test_steps: Locate help section in main navigation
test_cases.expected_results: Help section is displayed.

test_cases.title: Search Help Articles
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search help articles.
test_steps: Enter keyword in help search bar
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant help articles are displayed.

test_cases.title: Contact Support Option Available
test_cases.description: Verify that contact support option is available in help section.
test_cases.expected_results: Contact support form or option is displayed.

test_cases.title: Submit Support Request Confirmation
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives confirmation after submitting a support request.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives confirmation of support request submission.

test_cases.title: FAQs Listed and Searchable
test_cases.description: Verify that FAQs are listed and searchable in help section.
test_cases.expected_results: FAQs are listed and searchable.

test_cases.title: Session Timeout After Inactivity
test_cases.description: Verify that session times out after configurable period of inactivity.
test_steps: Remain inactive for session timeout period
test_cases.expected_results: User is notified before session expires and logged out automatically.

test_cases.title: Session Timeout Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that user is notified before session expires.
test_steps: Remain inactive for near timeout period
test_cases.expected_results: User receives notification before session expires.

test_cases.title: Session Timeout Does Not Affect Unsaved DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that unsaved dATF is not lost when session times out.
test_steps: Remain inactive until session times out
Check if unsaved dATF is available
test_cases.expected_results: Unsaved dATF is preserved or user is prompted to save before timeout.

test_cases.title: Export DATF in CSV Format
test_cases.description: Verify that user can export dATF in CSV format.
test_steps: Select dATF fields and date range
test_cases.expected_results: CSV file is generated and downloadable.

test_cases.title: Export DATF in PDF Format
test_cases.description: Verify that user can export dATF in PDF format.
test_steps: Select dATF fields and date range
test_cases.expected_results: PDF file is generated and downloadable.

test_cases.title: Export DATF Boundary Test - Large Date Range
test_cases.description: Verify that system can handle export requests for large date ranges.
preconditions: DATF available for large date range
test_cases.expected_results: Exported file contains all selected dATF and system confirms successful export.

test_cases.title: Export DATF Edge Case - No DATF Selected
test_cases.description: Verify that system displays error when no dATF fields are selected for export.
test_steps: Attempt to export without selecting dATF fields
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message and export is not performed.

test_cases.title: Select Preferred Language
test_cases.description: Verify that user can select preferred language from settings.
test_cases.expected_results: Application updates to selected language.

test_cases.title: Language Selection Persists Across Sessions
test_cases.description: Verify that selected language persists after user logs out and logs back in.
test_cases.expected_results: Application displays in previously selected language.

test_cases.title: Default Language for New Users
test_cases.description: Verify that default language is applied for new users.
test_cases.expected_results: Application displays in default language.

test_cases.title: Fallback to Default Language for Missing Translations
test_cases.description: Verify that system falls back to default language for missing translations.
test_steps: Navigate to section with missing translation
test_cases.expected_results: System displays label/message in default language.

test_cases.title: Bulk Select Multiple Items
test_cases.description: Verify that user can select multiple items for bulk actions.
test_cases.expected_results: Multiple items are selected for bulk action.

test_cases.title: Bulk Delete Items with Confirmation
test_cases.description: Verify that system confirms before performing bulk delete action.
test_cases.expected_results: Items are deleted and user receives feedback on success.

test_cases.title: Bulk Move Items
test_cases.description: Verify that user can move multiple items in bulk.
test_cases.expected_results: Items are moved to selected destination and user receives feedback.

test_cases.title: Bulk Export Items
test_cases.description: Verify that user can export multiple selected items.
test_cases.expected_results: Exported file is generated and downloadable.

test_cases.title: Bulk Actions Edge Case - No Items Selected
test_cases.description: Verify that system displays error when bulk action is attempted with no items selected.
test_steps: Attempt bulk action without selecting any items
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message and action is not performed.

summary: 91 comprehensive test cases were generated covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all 20 user stories. Test cases include functional, non-functional, and security tests, ensuring thorough coverage of registration, authentication, profile management, dashboard, search and filters, item details and favorites, notifications, admin management, audit logs, access control, responsive design, help/support, session timeout, dATF export, multi-language support, and bulk actions.
